metadata.description: Curated collection of astronomy and solar eclipse photography links from Unsplash, NASA, ESA, Pixabay, and other sources
metadata.license: Most Unsplash images are free for commercial use with no attribution required. NASA and ESA images generally public domain. Check individual source licensing.
